Passive.Name: An Arbiter
Passive.Desc: At the start of the Scene, draw until 4 pages are in hand. On Hit Inflict 1 Fairy, inflict an additional 1 Fairy and 1 Bleed at Personal Emotion Level 3.

Passive.Name: Speed IV
Passive.Desc: Speed Dice Slot +2. Gain an additional Speed die at Emotion Level 3. (Cannot Overlap)

Passive.Name: Overbreathing
Passive.Desc: Restore 2 Light upon using a page whose original Cost is 4 or higher

Passive.Name: Eye Of Death / Boundary Of Death
Passive.Desc: All dice gain +4 Power / If the Card used is "Boundary Of Death" and its natural roll is Max, and is 4 or higher, Draw 2 Pages and recover 4 Light

Passive.Name: Panic: Fear
Passive.Desc: Upon reaching -45 SP, Gain 1 Feeble, 2 Disarm, and 3 Bind

Passive.Name: Panic: Revenge
Passive.Desc: Upon reaching -45 SP, Gain 1 Strength, 3 Damage Up, 3 Fragile, and 6 Bind

Passive.Name: Panic: Slowdown
Passive.Desc: Upon reaching -45 SP, Gain 1 Fragile, 3 Bind

Passive.Name: Panic: Bloodthirst
Passive.Desc: Upon reaching -45 SP, Gain 2 Fragile, 2 Damage Up

Passive.Name: Panic: Anger
Passive.Desc: Upon reaching -45 SP, Gain 1 Strength, 2 Fragile

Passive.Name: Panic: Standoff
Passive.Desc: Upon reaching -45 SP, Recover 5 Hp and gain 1 Fragile this scene, and next scene gain 2 Damage Up

Passive.Name: Panic: Decisive Break
Passive.Desc: Upon reaching -45 SP, Recover 10 Hp and fully restore Stagger, and next scene gain 2 Damage Up and 2 Fragile

Passive.Name: Panic: Gamble
Passive.Desc: Upon reaching -45 SP, Activate one of the following effects: - Restore 5 Hp - Restore 10 Stagger - Gain 2 Damage Up next scene - Gain 1 Fragile next scene

Passive.Name: Panic: Protector
Passive.Desc: Upon reaching -45 SP, Give all other allies 2 Protection, and 2 Disarm

Passive.Name: Panic: Burning Passion
Passive.Desc: Upon reaching -45 SP, Gain 5 Burn, 5 Disarm, 2 Strength and 3 Bind

Passive.Name: Panic: Burning Passion
Passive.Desc: Upon reaching -45 SP, Gain 3 Paralyze and 2 Haste

Passive.Name: Panic: Bleeding Heart
Passive.Desc: Upon reaching -45 SP, Gain 7 Bleed, 2 Damage Up and 1 Slash Power Up

Passive.Name: Panic: Corpse Liquidification
Passive.Desc: Upon reaching -45 SP, Lose 25 Hp, and 25 Stagger

Passive.Name: Panic: Exhaustion
Passive.Desc: Upon reaching -45 SP, Break All Speed Dice, and gain 2 Fragile

Passive.Name: Panic: Chronic Lung Cancer
Passive.Desc: Upon reaching -45 SP, Lose all Smoke on self and die

Passive.Name: Panic: Fate of the Prescript
Passive.Desc: Upon reaching -45 SP, Become untargetable for this turn, Next turn gain 5 Protection

Passive.Name: Ensemble partiellement ordonn√©
Passive.Desc: Upon reaching -45 SP, Gain 5 Dmg Up, Strength and Fragile

Passive.Name: The Red Mist
Passive.Desc: Upon reaching -45 SP, Gain 5 Dmg Up, Strength and Set this Unit's SP to the Max

Passive.Name: Reverse Panic
Passive.Desc: Upon reaching -45 SP, Gain 2 Dmg Up, Strength and Protection

Passive.Name: Forceful Arbitration
Passive.Desc: Upon reaching 45 SP, Gain 3 Haste

Passive.Name: Sorrow and despair
Passive.Desc: Upon reaching -45 SP, Gain 3 Strength and Protection

Passive.Name: Shattered Blade
Passive.Desc: On Hit Inflict Bleed equal to owner's SP/9 to target

Passive.Name: Extreme Edge
Passive.Desc: On Hit deal (Damage Dealt/5) SP Damage to target

Passive.Name: Will of The City
Passive.Desc: On Hit deal 2 Fixed SP Damage to target and gain 1 Damage Up next scene

Passive.Name: Shi
Passive.Desc: This unit does not gain positive SP On Clash Win, Instead they lose SP On Clash Win and they Gain SP On Clash Lose (This passive does not change Unit Death SP mechanics)

Passive.Name: The Commander
Passive.Desc: If the character has 11 or more Charge at the start of the Scene, give 1 Strength, Protection and Endurance to all allies. At the end of each Scene, enter "Disposal" mode if no other allies are present Deal 2% additional Damage and Break Damage per Charge this unit has.
